text.div:
HACC Program for Peter James Chalmers at HL7 Healthcare 15 Sept 2014 - current
was on leave from 22 Sept - 24 Sept while in respite care

referralRequest.display: Referral from Example Aged Care Services

x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/episodeofcare-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/EpisodeOfCare \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"EpisodeOfCare","id":"a877449d-237e-48c7-b323-8f1f81ecc472","identifier":[{"system":"http://example.org/sampleepisodeofcare-identifier","value":"123"}],"status":"active","statusHistory":[{"status":"planned","period":{"start":"2014-09-01T08:00:00+08:00","end":"2014-09-14T08:00:00+08:00"}},{"status":"active","period":{"start":"2014-09-15T08:00:00+08:00","end":"2014-09-21T08:00:00+08:00"}},{"status":"onhold","period":{"start":"2014-09-22T08:00:00+08:00","end":"2014-09-24T08:00:00+08:00"}},{"status":"active","period":{"start":"2014-09-25T08:00:00+08:00"}}],"type":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/episodeofcare-type","code":"hacc","display":"Home and Community Care"}]}],"diagnosis":[{"condition":{"reference":"Condition/stroke"},"role":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/diagnosis-role","code":"CC","display":"Chief complaint"}]},"rank":1}],"patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"managingOrganization":{"reference":"Organization/hl7"},"period":{"start":"2014-09-01T08:00:00+08:00"},"referralRequest":[{"display":"Referral from Example Aged Care Services"}],"careManager":{"reference":"Practitioner/14","display":"Amanda Assigned"},"team":[{"reference":"CareTeam/example","display":"example care team"}],"account":[{"reference":"Account/example","display":"example account"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.971+08:00"}}'

x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/episodeofcare-example.json curl --location --request PUT 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/EpisodeOfCare/EpisodeOfCare-example \' --header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \ --data-raw '{"resourceType":"EpisodeOfCare","id":"example","text":{"status":"generated","div":"
\n HACC Program for Peter James Chalmers at HL7 Healthcare 15 Sept 2014 - current
\n\t\t\twas on leave from 22 Sept - 24 Sept while in respite care\n
"},"identifier":[{"system":"http://example.org/sampleepisodeofcare-identifier","value":"JK3BPQNOcXRU"}],"status":"active","statusHistory":[{"status":"planned","period":{"start":"2014-09-01","end":"2014-09-14"}},{"status":"active","period":{"start":"2014-09-15","end":"2014-09-21"}},{"status":"onhold","period":{"start":"2014-09-22","end":"2014-09-24"}},{"status":"active","period":{"start":"2014-09-25"}}],"type":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/episodeofcare-type","code":"hacc","display":"EWJ8wOmpbrfdk"}]}],"diagnosis":[{"condition":{"reference":"Condition/stroke"},"role":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/diagnosis-role","code":"CC","display":"z2deO4AxEuZqmM"}]},"rank":1}],"patient":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"managingOrganization":{"reference":"Organization/hl7"},"period":{"start":"2014-09-01"},"referralRequest":[{"display":"2mCk6ADFdjIF"}],"careManager":{"reference":"Practitioner/14","display":"UtkMP2CHXOdjcht"},"team":[{"reference":"CareTeam/example","display":"lPkPh2sIs1AEov"}],"account":[{"reference":"Account/example","display":"od7pnyH3jJyPily"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"C81PX04UjBtAXBo"}]}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
javascript Axios

parameters.name: care-manager
parameters.description: Care manager/care coordinator for the patient

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Conditions/problems/diagnoses this episode of care is for

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The provided date search value falls within the episode of care's period

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Business Identifier(s) relevant for this EpisodeOfCare

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The organization that has assumed the specific responsibilities of this EpisodeOfCare

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient who is the focus of this episode of care

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the Episode of Care as provided (does not check the status history collection)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type/class  - e.g. specialist referral, disease management

referralRequest.display: Referral from Example Aged Care Services
